conversation.text: Hi! What can I do for you?
I'd like to learn mock tuna salad. I'm a vegan.
First you need to prepare tofu by squeezing and crumbling.
Can you give more details?
You can squeeze tofu between your hands. Then crumble it into small pieces evenly.
evidence: Crumble the tofu into a large bowl. The tofu crumbles should be small and even.

conversation.text: I see. What's next?
Do you have celery, carrot and red onion?
evidence: Prepare the celery, carrot, and red onion

conversation.text: Yes, I do.
Then you need to dice 1 celery stalk, mince 1 tablespoon of red onions and grate 2 tablespoons of carrots.
evidence: mince enough red onion to get 1 tablespoon
Take a small carrot and grate it to get 2 tablespoons

conversation.text: Got it. What's next?
Then mix your vegetables with tofu.
evidence: Place the prepared vegetables into the bowl with the crumbled tofu.

conversation.text: Mixture is ready.
Next, we'll prepare the wet ingredients.
What's that?
The ingredients include 1/2 cup of vegan mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons of tamari, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon of kelp powder.
evidence: 1/2 cup (116 g) of vegan mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons of tamari, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon of kelp powder

conversation.text: Sure, I have prepared them.
Stir them until they are combined.
evidence: Stir the wet ingredients until they're combined

conversation.text: Ready now.
Then scoop the wet ingredients into the bowl with tofu and vegetables. Stir them until combined.
evidence: Scoop the wet ingredients into the bowl with the tofu and vegetables. Use a spoon to stir the salad, so the mixture is combined.

conversation.text: Got it. What's next?
We have finished the recipe. You can serve the salad now or store it for a few days.
evidence: You can serve the salad immediately or store it for a few days.

conversation.text: I'll eat it now. Thanks!
Do you have any other questions?
Not from me.
Good. Bye!

recipe.title: How to Make Vegan Mock Tuna Salad

procedure.description: Take 1 pound (453 g) of firm tofu and gently squeeze it between your hands. The excess water in the tofu should drain out. Crumble the tofu into a large bowl. The tofu crumbles should be small and even.

procedure.summary: Prepare the celery, carrot, and red onion.
procedure.description: Use a sharp knife to carefully dice 1 celery stalk. You'll also need to mince enough red onion to get 1 tablespoon. Take a small carrot and grate it to get 2 tablespoons. Place the prepared vegetables into the bowl with the crumbled tofu.
In a separate bowl, add 1/2 cup (116 g) of vegan mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons of tamari, 1 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon of kelp powder. Stir the wet ingredients until they're combined.

procedure.summary: Combine the tofu mock tuna salad.
procedure.description: Scoop the wet ingredients into the bowl with the tofu and vegetables. Use a spoon to stir the salad, so the mixture is combined. You can serve the salad immediately or store it for a few days. Consider serving the salad as part of a sandwich, dip, or green salad topping.
